General.Name: Ninestar Corp
General.Description: Ninestar Corporation engages in the research and development, production, processing, and sales of self-produced printers, and printer consumables and accessories. Its principal products include copiers, laser printers, laser printer consumables, printer main control SoC chips, consumable chips, industrial-grade/vehicle-grade microcontrollers, system-level chips, encryption chips, general printer consumables, and printing management services, as well as investment and management services. The company was formerly known as Apex Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Ninestar Corporation in May 2017. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Zhuhai, the People's Republic of China.
